title: Solo para mujeres
overview: A four-part documentary series created in collaboration with the founders of Solo para mujeres and a team of filmmakers and historians with extensive experience. Solo para mujeres will serve as a lens through which to observe some of the processes that have shaped Mexico today: the change in social roles, the liberation of women, the opening of democracy, the conquest of the public sphere by civil society, the emergence of new television stars, the pluralization of desires.Â
